lists.explanation: to extract a list of strings
lists.prompt: The answer to this question is a list of texts. Those texts must be placed inside the <text> placeholder within a JSON object using the following template, three dots ... denote a continuation of the list: <template>

knowledge.prompt: The answer to this question must be placed into the <text> placeholder within a JSON object using the following template: <template>

timeseries.explanation: to extract a pair of time-series elements
timeseries.prompt: The answer to this question must be time-series data written into a JSON array with the <milliseconds-since-epoch> and <numeric-value> placeholders using the following template: <template>
